name: The Nokia Killer
description:
READ THE CONTROLS!

Your neighbours keep bothering you when you're playing on your nokia so you decide to kill them.

You bring your trusty knife with you. There are windows you can break, they will make a big sound and attract nearby people so becareful. Neighbours run around in fear when they see you holding a knife , some of them will fight when they see you do that so watch out. If you're injured then there are some health kits around the level to heal you. You can also yell to distract neighbours. Kill everyone to win.

This game doesn't have much but I hope that you will have fun :)

Controls:

  • WASD: move around
  • 1: equip knife
  • /: use knife, stab the neighbours multiple times
  • F: interact
  • C: yell to distract your neighbours
  • Esc: exit level
